rendered]');});}); function scrollToMessage(event,id){const element=document.getElementById('chatlog__message-container-'+id);if(!element) return;event.preventDefault();element.classList.add('chatlog__message-container--highlighted');window.scrollTo({top:element.getBoundingClientRect().top-document.body.getBoundingClientRect().top-(window.innerHeight/2),behavior:'smooth'});window.setTimeout(()=>element.classList.remove('chatlog__message-container--highlighted'),2000);} function showSpoiler(event,element){if(!element) return;if(element.classList.contains('chatlog__attachment--hidden')){event.preventDefault();element.classList.remove('chatlog__attachment--hidden');} if(element.classList.contains('chatlog__markdown-spoiler--hidden')){event.preventDefault();element.classList.remove('chatlog__markdown-spoiler--hidden');}} Snackvivor S1: Cheeseland Game Information / tree-mail Production will communicate with all castaways via tree mail! Han-varti 12/28/2022 7:22 PM cheese 02/03/2023 8:23 PM Welcome to the game @Castaways ! This will be where you get lots of important information for the game! Such as this: You are now free to use 1-on-1s! Have fun cheese 02/03/2023 8:37 PM Also your first challenge will be 02/04/2023 7:30 PM 20:38 (This fun little feature converts to your timezone so it should display when the challenge actually is for you! If you use a VPN, it will convert to that timezone. For reference things will typically happen at 7:30 PM EST) 20:39 @Castaways Han-varti 02/03/2023 8:46 PM @Castaways Some of you may know this already, but please don't DM one another! You should not be talking to one another outside of the server -- use your one on ones. Remember to read the rules, and if after reading the rules you still have questions, just let production know in your submissions! Han-varti 02/04/2023 12:49 AM @Castaways I made you folks some emojis! I MIGHT make you some fancier ones down the road We'll see... 1 1 1 00:50 cheese 02/04/2023 1:34 PM Good morning @Castaways Hope you all enjoyed your first night with your tribes! Just a reminder that we have a challenge later today, specifically at 02/04/2023 7:30 PM And another reminder to please make sure you have read all of #game-rules if you haven't already. It will likely answer any questions you have about the game, and if it doesn't feel free to ask in your submissions! maibelle 02/04/2023 8:19 PM @Castaways @All Updates Hello friends!! Unfortunately, our pal Melzcat will be unable to continue participating in our season. These kinds of things happen all the time, and we wish her much luck on her move Due to the timing of this, we are able to bring in one of our amazing subs!! Please welcome our newest player, @14th - Pichu We will be working on updating permissions and chats, please be patient with us and kind to your new castaway pal! If you have any questions, don't be afraid to ask us in your submissions or tribe chats!! And don't forget: Stay Cheesy sappho 02/04/2023 8:19 PM 39 20:19 easiest stars of my life sappho 02/06/2023 7:13 PM @Castaways @All Updates @Tribal Updates Get a look at the new @Parmesan Tribe, with Carie being the first to leave. Challenge will be incoming in approximately 17 minutes. 10 Han-varti 02/07/2023 11:25 PM Hello Castaways~ I apologize for the delay. I have a small gift ~ each member of production and each of your fellow players including our F18 finisher Carie [sans one, who may get back to me] offered up one song for our first ever Snackvivor playlist! This is Snackvivor S1: Cheeseland! These are in no particular order, but there is one additional song: our season theme, Cheeseburger in Paradise https://open.spotify.com/playlist/2gQ4FLx0Spq4fZ3KIFWecS?si=9d6fb12764424e20 Hope you enjoy listening ❤️ Happy snacking. Snackvivor S1: Cheeseland hanhanvanjasp · Playlist · 26 songs · 1 likes 5 Han-varti 02/07/2023 11:33 PM Oh, and, just to clear up any confusion, production is at the top the PLAYERS are in no particular order. Thank you. cheese 02/08/2023 5:51 PM Good afternoon @Castaways , got a couple of small announcements for y'all today First off just a friendly reminder that confessionals are a safe place for you to share your thoughts on the game and anyone who can see them is a trusted person in the community. If there is anything happening or something you are thinking about, please share it! Both production and the spectators love to see what is going on and confessionals make it easier for to understand what is happening! Y'all are doing great so far but just wanted to make sure everyone felt comfortable and was encouraged to talk there. (And while we are on the topic please remember to use submissions for any questions about the game) Additionally, since it has come up wanted to make a mention of some etiquette for editing/deleting messages. It isn't a hard rule but we would prefer if you minimized your deletions and edits (beyond correcting a typo), as in the spirit of the game of Survivor you can't really take back something you have said out loud. Be conscious of what you are saying! And while we are here might as well remind everyone to read #game-rules if you haven't read them in their entirety yet. Thank you all and have a great day! 4 maibelle 02/08/2023 7:19 PM @Castaways @All Updates @Tribal Updates Take a look at the new @Mozzarella Tribe, with Drew being voted out at tribal council. Challenge will be incoming in approximately 11 minutes. calamari 02/10/2023 7:10 PM @Castaways @All Updates @Tribal Updates get a look at your new @Parmesan and @Mozzarella tribes, with Holly and Toon being voted out at their tribal councils 19:11 join me in 19 minutes for the next challenge <3 (edited) Han-varti 02/10/2023 7:55 PM @Castaways You are ONLY allowed to talk in your tribe chats right now until I send you more tree mail. Do not make me come after you~! 19:58 @Castaways More accurately, don't make @Dinocicle come after you. He's hungry. 4 Dinocicle 02/10/2023 7:58 PM BARK BARK BARK BARK i mean elephant noises 1 1 cheese 02/10/2023 8:23 PM @Castaways 1-on-1s are open! Happy swap Han-varti 02/11/2023 1:16 AM @Castaways Just for you! 01:16 4 01:16 Han-varti 02/11/2023 3:32 PM Hi @Castaways ! Please give us a brief bit of your attention. We take misgendering very seriously. If someone is using the wrong pronouns for a person, we bring it to their attention and expect a correction. We don’t just leave this to players to correct on their own. In the event that our correction requests are not acknowledged at all, or in the event that they continue frequently despite education, we count these as warnings. If things escalate beyond this point, we will warn of a time out and then enforce a time out. This means no chatting in the server for an amount of time determined by the hosts. In the unfortunate event that things escalate past this point (or if misgendering becomes targeted or intentional), we do reserve the right to remove people from the game. These rules also apply to all of our spectators! Please do your part and check the pronouns of folks playing the game. It helps me to visualize them as a physical person who goes by that pronoun and say it out loud. We are not going to get on your case if you are making an effort even when you make mistakes! 9 4 4 cheese 02/13/2023 7:25 PM Hello @Castaways @All Updates , getting a look at the new @Brie tribe with Pichu voted out last Tribal Council. I also come bearing some important news! We are taking a break day! Yay! So starting right now and lasting for the next 24 hours (until our challenge announcement tomorrow) we will be having a quaint little break. This means no talking whatsoever. So stop all conversations in tribe chats, 1-on-1 chats and alliance chats immediately! We don't want to have to constantly be reminding people, so please just do not talk in those anymore! Thank you and have a wonderful day, see y'all tomorrow! 2 19:30 This was a pre-scheduled break day and also talking in confessionals is allowed if you truly desire to do so, but otherwise see y'all tomorrow :) (edited) cheese 02/15/2023 3:39 PM Hello I have something to share! Note: Please only fill out the survey if you are currently a college student (undergrad, graduate, post-grad, etc) I'm working on my capstone project for my Master's Degree and doing some research as part of it, if y'all could take a few minutes to fill out this survey that would be super helpful! It's literally like 10 multiple-choice questions so should take a minute or two at most. Thank you! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeedlBhrU4vL8BGSB8hGelG-xa_w76IjlK5jyvQ11T6dAWdAQ/viewform Travel Survey sappho 02/16/2023 7:17 PM @Castaways @All Updates @Tribal Updates Get a look at the new @Brie tribe, with Eck being voted out. 19:17 Challenge to come soon 19:17 3 Han-varti 02/18/2023 7:12 PM Hello @Castaways @All Updates , getting a look at the new @Cotija tribe with Connor voted out at the last Tribal Council. Join us at half past the hour for your next challenge~ Han-varti 02/18/2023 8:05 PM Hello @Castaways ❤️ You still need to stay out of your one on ones, but I thought I could give you this! 20:05 6 20:05 Gouda emoji! 20:07 @Castaways This is why we can't have nice things cheese 02/28/2023 12:20 AM Hey @Castaways Apologies for the late night ping but I come bearing some good news After tribal council tomorrow, we will be having another break day! Same drill as last time, everything besides your confessionals and submissions will be closed. We will return after 24 hours to resume the game. Just wanted to give some warning about it this time, this was in fact planned over a month ago 3 cheese 02/28/2023 7:12 PM @Castaways break will officially start at 7:30 pm est (in about 20 minutes). So you have until then to say your goodbyes before the break! Then everything (tribe chat, 1-on-1s, alliances) will be closed until challenge drop at 7:30 pm est tomorrow! cheese 02/28/2023 7:30 PM Ok bye go away (confessionals are fine but that is it) Dinocicle 02/28/2023 7:50 PM Pennys last words “Sucks that I was only voted out with two votes. Watch out guys. Swiss is stronger than we think and has someone on their side that we don’t expect. I’m unsure who that second vote came from but if I had to guess it’s ani or typo. Be careful. Watch out. And thanks for letting me play this game with y’all! ” 5 calamari 03/03/2023 7:20 PM hi challenge announcement MIGHT be like 5 mins late i just need to get to my computer 1 cheese 03/05/2023 1:59 PM Hi @Gouda , got a little something to ask of y'all The next immunity challenge will be live so we need some availability from y'all. Ideally we do it tonight after tribal council concludes, but can do it tomorrow morning if we absolutely need to. So let us know in submissions your availability for the next 24 hour cycle (7:30 pm est tonight - 7:30 pm est tomorrow). Thank you! Exported 44 message(s)

rendered]');});}); function scrollToMessage(event,id){const element=document.getElementById('chatlog__message-container-'+id);if(!element) return;event.preventDefault();element.classList.add('chatlog__message-container--highlighted');window.scrollTo({top:element.getBoundingClientRect().top-document.body.getBoundingClientRect().top-(window.innerHeight/2),behavior:'smooth'});window.setTimeout(()=>element.classList.remove('chatlog__message-container--highlighted'),2000);} function showSpoiler(event,element){if(!element) return;if(element.classList.contains('chatlog__attachment--hidden')){event.preventDefault();element.classList.remove('chatlog__attachment--hidden');} announcements Han-varti 12/28/2022 7:17 PM cheese 01/03/2023 1:10 PM Happy 1 month until Snackvivor: Cheeseland! (edited) 2 1 Han-varti 01/24/2023 6:22 PM Hello snackers! Just shamelessly drawing your attention to an updated logo design. Snackvivor: Cheeseland starts in one week from today! Our excitement levels are a solid 11 out of 10 and we are ecstatic to share what we have made with you. So if you are waiting until the last minute to fill one out, then don't wait any longer! Thank you all for the support so far, we are so excited to share the adventure with you. Only 2 more days until we head to Cheeseland and the game begins! (edited) 6 Han-varti 02/01/2023 4:43 PM Hi all! Quick tech note from yours truly Please make sure your PFPs (Discord profile picture/avatar/icons) are what you want them to be in the server by the application deadline tonight. In the event that you are casted, your picture will be used. If you have nitro, I highly recommend you set your main pfp and your Snackvivor server pfp to the same image. Sometimes the server magic we use to copy them is picky and takes the main one instead of the server one! While I’m here, remember to stay tuned even if you applied but can’t be casted this season. There will be games for spectators and edgic to keep the party going — not to mention a stellar cast to watch We’re almost there! Happy snacking! calamari 02/01/2023 10:12 PM @everyone HI GUYS! Applications are OFFICIALLY CLOSED! a huge THANK YOU to everyone that applied! we got to kick off our first season with 50+ APPLICATIONS As we begin casting, bear with us as we get through all of them! we will be hosting check ins leading up to the cast reveal on February 3, 2023 at 7:30 EST once again THANK YOU ALL SO MUCH!!!!!!!! 21 6 11 8 6 6 8 6 4 3 sappho 02/02/2023 11:26 AM @everyone Gooood morning Snackvivor! All of our check-ins have been sent out! Everyone who applied should have one, in order to be cast you MUST respond to the DM one of the production members sent you . Please check your DMs! We're very excited for tomorrow and can't wait to get the season kicked off! This is another reminder that if you are not cast, PLEASE understand that it wasn't unappreciated and we hope that you stick around in the server to join our spec games and enjoy the season with us. Thank you all again SO SO SO SO MUCH and I hope you have a good breakfast! (edited) 14 cheese 02/03/2023 7:21 PM @All Updates Guess what! Cast reveal is in 10 minutes! function showSpoiler(event,element){if(!element) return;if(element.classList.contains('chatlog__attachment--hidden')){event.preventDefault();element.classList.remove('chatlog__attachment--hidden');} if(element.classList.contains('chatlog__markdown-spoiler--hidden')){event.preventDefault();element.classList.remove('chatlog__markdown-spoiler--hidden');}} Snackvivor S1: Cheeseland Game Information / game-rules maibelle 01/09/2023 1:55 AM cheese 01/11/2023 2:38 AM Basic Rules: - Do not seek help from people outside of the game. Do not talk to people about the game with people not on your current tribe. - While playing, do not talk to other players outside of this server. So no DMs, everything will happen in the server. - No impersonating other players. - Do not be excessively toxic or harsh to other players, spectators, or members of the production team. This includes threats of any sort, which could lead to removal from the game and further punishments. - Don't share screenshots (and avoid copy + pasting long series of messages) to players inside the game about game related content. They may be posted in your confessionals though. - No posting logs of chats with other players. It doesn’t matter whether they are real logs or fake logs, or whether it’s one line or a hundred lines, you may not send them to other players. (Feel free to send them in your confessional though!) - If there is a serious game-related problem, please don't hesitate to reach out to production! Game Basics: - There are two phases of the game: Challenges and Tribal Councils. Challenges will determine what tribe/player will have immunity for the upcoming Tribal Council. The Tribal Council will determine what player is voted out of the game. - During the Tribe stage of the game, challenges will be won and lost as a whole tribe. - During the Individual Stage of the game, challenges will be won and lost by a single person. The winner of the immunity challenge cannot be voted for at the next Tribal Council. The winner of the immunity challenge has up until 12 hours before votes lock to give away their immunity to someone else on their tribe. Challenges: - Reward and Immunity challenges are the tasks that players or tribes will compete in to win rewards or immunity (and be safe from Tribal Council). The nature of the challenges themselves will vary. - During Tribe (Team) challenges, some players may have to sit out some of the challenges (usually to make even teams). Players cannot sit out during two consecutive challenges unless otherwise stated. - Scripting/autohotkey (AHK) programs are not permitted during challenges. Contestants are expected to manually do the challenges themselves. In general, third-party informational resources will be allowed for some of the challenges, ex: YouTube, Wikipedia, etc. Contestants are welcome to ask whether a specific resource is allowed on a challenge-by-challenge basis. Advantages: - Special advantages, including but not limited to idols and extra votes, may or may not be hidden in the discord server and will be rewarded to the first player(s) to find them. If you think you found one, put it in your submissions channel. - Advantages can only be played during the advantage period, and not for a revote. However, advantages played during the advantage period will still have their effects apply during a revote. You may pre-play your advantage in your submissions in case of not being online for the advantage period. - If a player chooses to play an advantage, they cannot undo this action. If the advantage requires choosing a specific player, players cannot switch the target once they've used it. Advantages are transferrable upon request. - All commands will follow the same format which is "?" prefix, all lowercase, and one word. For example: If you think the phrase "I love cheese" is a command, you would submit ?ilovecheese (edited) cheese 01/11/2023 2:51 AM Tribal Council: - During Tribal Council, each player at the council submits one vote for the player they wish to eliminate from the game. Votes will be submitted on a designated parchment and only in the submissions channel. - Voting deadlines are typically 24 hours after the immunity challenge. The voting stage will start immediately after a challenge and always end at the deadline. Extensions will be rare and extremely situational. - You may switch your vote as many times as you wish. Just make sure that you submit your final vote before the deadline, as the last vote you submit before the deadline is what will be counted. - You may not intentionally vote for yourself at a Tribal Council. If we have reason to believe this has been done with intent by not submitting a vote by the deadline, disciplinary action may be taken. - The vote total will be revealed to the tribe at the end of the night, but the hosts will not announce who voted for who. You may not claim or share parchments with other players - After the votes are submitted (but before they are revealed), there is a 3-minute advantage period wherein players can play advantages. - Players voted out will have a minute to post some final words. Please keep them short as you only have a brief second to share them. - Players voted out cannot be communicated with following their removal from the game. There will be absolutely no communication between eliminated players and alive players regarding the game until it reaches its conclusion. - Beginning at a certain point, those voted out will form the Jury, who will eventually vote for the winner. The Jury will be present at every Tribal Council after they are voted to follow the game. There will be a "live Tribal Council" held before the votes are revealed where the hosts will ask everyone questions similar to how Jeff does on the show. It's not mandatory to be there but it's fun! Ties: - In case of an initial tie, there will an immediate re-vote cycle where you can only vote for the players the tied votes were on. You may only communicate with your tribe members in the Tribal Council chat between the announcement of a tie and the re-vote. The players who the vote was tied on will not vote in the re-vote. If everyone chooses to lock their vote early, the tie may be resolved at that time. - In case of a second tie, a discussion period will begin. If the non-tied players are able to come to an unanimous consensus about eliminating one of the tied players, then that player will be eliminated. If they are unable to come to an unanimous consensus, the person who leaves will be determined by a rock draw. The players who tied for the most votes both times will be safe from this tiebreaker, along with players with individual immunity or players with an idol played on them. Final Tribal Council and Winning the Game: The goal of the game is to reach the Final Tribal Council, which typically occurs with just two or three people left in the game. You cannot win the game unless you make it to the Final Tribal Council. - At the Final Tribal Council, the remaining players in the game speak to the Jury and try to convince the Jury that they deserve to win the game. - Each finalist will write an opening statement speech on why they deserve to win the game. Following opening statements, each Jury member will have the opportunity to ask the finalists questions. They may say or ask whatever they want. An open and public dialogue will occur, and back-and-forth conversations with many members is encouraged. - When everyone is done speaking, the Jury will vote privately on who wins the game. Whoever gets the most votes is the winner. Please ask a member of the Production team for clarification on rules if you have any questions! Exported 3 message(s)

mental-health Han-varti 12/28/2022 7:43 PM 19:43 Since it's easy to get deeply invested in ORGs, we want to emphasize that your mental health and well-being should always be your primary focus. Though the game is designed to be an exciting and fun way to spend your time, situations in the game may cause stress, anxiety, or otherwise be a lot to handle. It's important and healthy to give yourself rest when needed, and we encourage you to step back, take a break, and disconnect when you feel overwhelmed. There will also be scheduled break days during which chats will be locked to give us all some time away. You can always reach out to hosts or helpers to talk anything through, or even just to vent and have us listen. The link below contains a list of resources that can be used as a toolkit, accessible at any time. https://www.nimh.nih.gov/health/find-help/index.shtml Remember, if you don't want your messages to be visible to anyone outside of production, you can send them in your personal submissions channel. Take care of yourselves and have fun. 4 Exported 2 message(s)

season-info Han-varti 12/28/2022 7:26 PM 19:28 Meet the Production Team! cheese 12/28/2022 7:33 PM Hello! I am Cheese! I'm a 22 year old graduate student living in Southern California getting a degree in Digital Social Media. I am a huge fan of Survivor (which is what got me involved in ORGs), but I have many other hobbies and interests! Those include marching band (I drum), Pokémon, sports (football/F1), watching TV, and more! sappho 12/28/2022 7:34 PM Greetings gamers. My name is Sappho (she/her) and I'm 29 and living in sunny Arizona. When I'm not working (as an IT engineer) I am cooking with my wife, playing video games (ask me about FFXIV or Pokemon), or solving murder mysteries with my wife and friends. My two cats are my co-stars. Han-varti 12/28/2022 7:36 PM Hi there, I'm Han (they/he/she) or @Han-varti for this cheesy experience. I am a 27 year old hospice nurse and also a huge nerd. I like digital painting, DnD, and consuming queer animated media. calamari 12/28/2022 8:33 PM hi!! im cnid (pronounced "nid"). im 20 and i use they/them pronouns. (if you want to spice it up my pronouns page is in my bio btw.) i'm currently double majoring in theatre and marketing, focusing on costuming, set design, and branding design. i'm a huge fan of slasher films, pokemon, and horses (please show me horse videos. please). Fish N' Chips 12/30/2022 12:50 PM Howdy! I'm Fish (he/him) and I'm a 25 year old computer scientist working in the DevOps field. When I'm not working you'll likely find me playing video games / board games, going out with friends, watching all kinds of movies or shows (especially Survivor), or getting into really ridiculous debates and dying on the most random hills. I also have three dogs and two cats, and I hate love them all. (edited) 12:50 maibelle 01/05/2023 8:49 PM Bonjour Bitches My name is Mai (He/She/They), I'm 21 and I live in Canada! I work at a TCG/Board Game store as a Trades Specialist and I'm a full-time PTP Contemporary Dance Student! When I'm not living my real human life, I let myself indulge in all the embarrassing dweeb shit I want - Like reading star wars books, watching shitty harem anime, or playing humiliating gatcha games with my girlfriend. That last one kind of nullifies itself because of the girlfriend-having, though Dinocicle 01/05/2023 9:03 PM I’m Dino platinumCheesecake 01/08/2023 9:00 PM I'm Platty, a 25 year old writer/educator/shitlord from the midwest. I make games and memes. Because I've got a lot of ORG hosting experience (lame), I'm serving as the royal advisor for this season (not lame). You'll get all the fresh, hip, and dare i say dope ideas of the reigning monarchs, plus a perfect scapegoat to blame whenever something about this season doesn't go your way, all in one friend-shaped package! (edited) Han-varti 02/03/2023 1:58 PM 13:58 "Survivor is a reality-competition television franchise produced in many countries around the world. The show features a group of contestants deliberately marooned in an isolated location, where they must provide food, water, fire, and shelter for themselves. The contestants compete in challenges for rewards and immunity from elimination. The contestants are progressively eliminated from the game as they are voted out by their fellow-contestants until only one remains to be awarded the grand prize and named the 'Sole Survivor.' ...take out all of the "out in the wilderness" elements and you get Survivor Online Reality Games (ORGs)!" - Torin Welcome to Cheeseland Once upon a time, there was a guy named Cheese. He did his darndest to win Smorgon Season 20. He even became the Hero of the Season. He didn’t succeed, but his thirst for ORGs developed spontaneously and would not soon be quenched. Some people rallied beside him. Others agreed to help at their requests. Others were forcibly kidnapped, caged, and fed only cheese while they were exploited for their knowledge and labor. Soon, Snackvivor was born, and there was only one land fit to host its inaugural season: Cheeseland. In Cheeseland, everything is built around cheese and the cheese adjacent. Cutlery has power. Favored cheeses bring unity. There’s nothing quite like charcuterie, here. Even the native population of Cheeseland seems to have strong feelings about cheese. What joys and dangers await you in Cheeseland? Well, you’ll have to wait and see. One thing is certain, though -- things will be very, very cheesy. Exported 13 message(s)

0}.chatlog__markdown-quote-border{margin-right:0.5rem;border:2px solid #4f545c;border-radius:3px}.chatlog__markdown-pre{background-color:#2f3136;font-family:"Consolas","Courier New",Courier,monospace;font-size:0.85rem;text-decoration:inherit}.chatlog__markdown-pre--multiline{display:block;margin-top:0.25rem;padding:0.5rem;border:2px solid #282b30;border-radius:5px;color:#b9bbbe}.chatlog__markdown-pre--multiline.hljs{background-color:#2f3136;color:#b9bbbe}.chatlog__markdown-pre--inline{display:inline-block;padding:2px;border-radius:3px}.chatlog__markdown-mention{border-radius:3px;padding:0 2px;background-color:rgba(88,101,242,.3);color:#dee0fc;font-weight:500}.chatlog__markdown-mention:hover{background-color:#5865f2;color:#ffffff}.chatlog__markdown-timestamp{background-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.1);padding:0 2px;border-radius:3px}.chatlog__emoji{width:1.325rem;height:1.325rem;margin:0 0.06rem;vertical-align:-0.4rem}.chatlog__emoji--small{width:1rem;height:1rem}.chatlog__emoji--large{width:2.8rem;height:2.8rem}.postamble{padding:1.25rem}.postamble__entry{color:#ffffff} document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',()=>{document.querySelectorAll('.chatlog__markdown-pre--multiline').forEach(e=>hljs.highlightBlock(e));}); document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',()=>{document.querySelectorAll('.chatlog__sticker--media[data-source]').forEach(e=>{const anim=lottie.loadAnimation({container:e,renderer:'svg',loop:true,autoplay:true,path:e.getAttribute('data-source')});anim.addEventListener('data_failed',()=>e.innerHTML='[Sticker cannot be rendered]');});}); function scrollToMessage(event,id){const element=document.getElementById('chatlog__message-container-'+id);if(!element) return;event.preventDefault();element.classList.add('chatlog__message-container--highlighted');window.scrollTo({top:element.getBoundingClientRect().top-document.body.getBoundingClientRect().top-(window.innerHeight/2),behavior:'smooth'});window.setTimeout(()=>element.classList.remove('chatlog__message-container--highlighted'),2000);} function showSpoiler(event,element){if(!element) return;if(element.classList.contains('chatlog__attachment--hidden')){event.preventDefault();element.classList.remove('chatlog__attachment--hidden');} if(element.classList.contains('chatlog__markdown-spoiler--hidden')){event.preventDefault();element.classList.remove('chatlog__markdown-spoiler--hidden');}} Snackvivor S1: Cheeseland Game Information / server-rules maibelle 01/09/2023 1:55 AM cheese 01/11/2023 2:53 AM Rules These are subject to change as needed. Failure to follow them will result in verbal warning, timeout, or ban depending on severity. This is to Production's discretion. 1. Follow Discord's ToS 2. Be kind to each other. We're all here to have fun; Players, Specs, and Production alike. 3. Absolutely no discrimination or inflammatory language. This is an open and accepting community, absolutely no racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, political discussion, or use of any type of slur. This rule is all encompassing. If you have to question if it's okay to say, probably just don't. 4. Keep everything PG-13. This is a family friendly event. 5. Do not spam pings or messages. This includes to both Production, Players, or Specs. 6. No advertising in general discussion channels. You can spread the good word, but don't spread the totally safe "I totally promise this isn't malware dude" links. Exported 2 message(s)
